<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cunning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=885)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 123</row>

**Price** 140 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched on a slashing or piercing weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The weapon performs divination magic on the blood of your foes, granting you insight into their abilities and weaknesses.
